alert.note: Alert for Le Flore; Sequoyah (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 1:48PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Crawford, northern Sebastian, southeastern Sequoyah and northeastern Le Flore Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 148 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lavaca to near Jenny Lind to 2 miles northwest of Pocola. Movement was northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Greenwood... Alma... Barling... Pocola... Lavaca... Arkoma... Bonanza... Moffett... Bloomer... Fort Smith Regional Airport... Jenny Lind... Excelsior... Kibler... Central City... Concord... Shibley... Scullyville... Braden... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 7 and 11. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
